title: Specific features of OXPAN Cooperator
description: Oxpan cooperator is a banking and accounting software developed for co-operatives. It is developed by an expert team of developers under regular collaboration and guidance of cooperative specialists and banking professionals.For the first time Charkhata Based Accounting is introduced by OXPAN Cooperator. Oxpan Cooperator is applicable to all versions of Microsoft Windows in networking or in single computer environment as well as for cooperatives of multi-user environment (many counters) as well as many branches also.
list: Follows National and International Rules
Sufficient to All Cooperative
Modern Banking Facilities: OXPAN Cooperator has following attractive banking facilities:
Accurate and Scientifice Calculations:

Flexible and Scalable: OXPAN software provides new ways for planning and implementation. It has the capability to extend your busines scale from one to millions and single computer to multiple branches.
Security Management: Transaction Audit, Userbased roles, Data backup facility are the security features. These features prevents wrong data injection, wrong manipulations, disaster of data loss.
Efficient Database Management System: Well designed database management system provides efficient and fast reporting facilities to the end users

Easy and Attractive: OXPAN Cooperator is the software which teaches you what is cooperative, what a accounting system is and what we can a software is. You learn entire cooperative by using this software. This is the software from which you can learn and enjoy working.
Plenty of Reporting Tools: OXPAN Software is rich of bundles of reports which are very useful for Managerial team and other stakeholders.
Nepali Reports: You can get all reports in Nepali and English both languages.
Scheduled closing/ Calculations/ Provisions and Backup: We can shedule for automatic calculations, provision and closings in routined time interval.

Interbranch Transaction: This the features which provides facility to wrok with multiple branches. Cooperative with many services can be benifitted by this. We can make branchwise transaction, branchwise entry branch-wise reporting. It can be done using cloud server or own local server with public static ip.

Regular Updates and Development: Your feedbacks are our properties. We collect feedbacks and suggestions, we get new ideas we discuss and beging planning. New features are developed in regular basis and provided back to the end user customers.
Urgent Report Facility:Current liquidity, Receivables, payables, and other emergency reports can generate in seconds.
Financial Analytical Tools:OXPAN Cooperator has very useful tools such as:
Self Designings: OXPAN Cooperator provides facility to design and plan new models in the cooperative by applying various options given for changing various rates and plans.
Minimized Steps: Automation of entry and reporting helps users to get the work done in very few required entries. It helps to save time and efforts as well.
Automatic Periodic Closing and Reporting:
Mobile Banking Facility: OXPAN Software provides facility to join with various mobile banking facilities like:

title: Specific features of OXPAN Cooperator Dudgha
description: Milk Production Cooperatives have two major duties, cooperative banking and milk collection. Cooperator Dugdha is for both activities in integrated way. Members are farmers and farmers are sellers so every farmers transaction is integrated with cooperative members. A farmer at the same time is a seller and a customer aslo. Thesse dugdha cooperatives may provide livestock and agriculture loans to the farmers. These activities are handled by Cooperator Dugdha program. Milk collection account is created as a farmers. Milk collected from on a counter and milk transaction is entered in computers with quality fat and SNF. Milk collection statements are provided periodically. The cost milk is paid on their accounts in the cooperative in weekly or monthly basis.
list: Applies All Dugdha Collection Cooperatives.
Follows National and International Rules
Sufficient to All Microfinance

title: Specific features of OXPAN ALLMart
description: Our business activities need proper care. Every business seeks a reliable accountant. OXPAN AllMart is developed to care many common enterprises which are involved in purchase and sales or sales only (service providers). A business is started with its investment by collecting shares. Then business starts making the workplace or factory. purchases goods and stores in a store. goods are delivered to shopping centers or in factories. New goods may also be prepared and resent to store. Goods are sold to the customers. Or services are created and sold to the customers. These all activities are to make a good profit and progress of business. Every steps of such economic activities should be recorded so that we could get the progress report as.
list: Supports many types of shops and trading houses.
Follows National and International Rules
Modern Shopping Facilities:
Accurate and Scientifice Calculations
Security Management: Transaction Audit, Userbased roles, Data backup facility are the security features. These features prevents wrong data injection, wrong manipulations, disaster of data loss.
Efficient Database Management System: Well designed database management system provides efficient and fast reporting facilities to the end users

Scheduled closing/ Calculations/ Provisions and Backup: We can shedule for automatic calculations, provision and closings in routined time interval.

title: Specific features of OXPAN CoopMart
description: We can conduct shop for our members. We can give account ID and a card. We can provide facilities to purchase from the mart and pay from the account with some discount. We ca it for the our customers the mart in cooperatives. Purchase from your member or sell to your members or do both for members. Sales book, purchase book stock, profit and loss all integrated with cooperative. Those cooperatives need OXPAN CoopMart. Our business activities need proper care. Every business seeks a reliable accountant. OXPAN CoopMart is developed to care business activities conducted by cooperatives which are involved in purchase and sales or sales only (service providers). A cooperative shop runs with the capital from the cooperative0 . Then business starts making the workplace or factory. purchases goods and stores in a store. goods are delivered to shopping centers or in factories
